hero.title: Next.js Starter
hero.description: Build faster with our powerful Next.js starter! Packed with essential tools like state management, React Query, I18n, CI/CD, and customizable UI components, it's everything you need to kickstart scalable, high-performance projects effortlessly.

features.description: Boost your development process with a powerful, feature-rich Next.js starter designed for speed, scalability, and developer productivity. Here's what makes it stand out:

openSource.name: Free and Open-Source
openSource.description: Our Next.js starter is fully open-source, allowing you to contribute, adapt, and stay in sync with the latest industry standards—all without any cost.

devStack.name: Modern Development Stack
devStack.summary: Experience seamless development with Next.js, React, and TypeScript.
devStack.description: Our starter is designed with scalability in mind, featuring React Query for data fetching, Redux for state management, and Tailwind CSS for rapid UI styling.

stateManagement.name: Optimized State Management
stateManagement.summary: Handle complex state easily with Redux and React Query.
stateManagement.description: This combination ensures efficient data fetching, caching, and global state management, making your applications fast and responsive.

i18n.name: Internationalization (i18n)
i18n.summary: Expand your project's reach across the globe with built-in i18n support.
i18n.description: Effortlessly localize your app to enhance user experience and attract a diverse audience with minimal setup.

cicd.name: Robust CI/CD & Testing Setup
cicd.summary: Focus on development while our GitHub Actions pipeline handles automated testing, linting, and deployment checks.
cicd.description: Unit, integration, and end-to-end testing are integrated for a rock-solid foundation.

devEnv.name: Developer-First Environment
devEnv.summary: Enjoy a clean, maintainable codebase with tools like ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript.
devEnv.description: Our starter is optimized for productivity, including reusable UI components, hooks, and a modular architecture designed for fast, scalable development.

stack.title: Tech Stack
stack.description: Boost your development process with a powerful, feature-rich Next.js starter designed for speed, scalability, and developer productivity. Here's what makes it stand out:

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: Fast by default, with config optimized for performance.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

eslint.title: ESlint & Prettier
eslint.description: For clean, consistent, and error-free code.

typescript.title: Extremely strict TypeScript
typescript.description: Leveraging TypeScript for unmatched type safety and robust application development.

testing.title: Jest & React Testing Library
testing.description: For rock-solid unit and integration tests.

cypress.title: Cypress
cypress.description: Utilizing Cypress to ensure seamless user experiences through reliable and efficient testing workflows.

storybook.title: Storybook
storybook.description: Create, test, and showcase your components.

git.title: Conventional commits git hook
git.description: Keep your commit history neat and tidy.

chakra.title: Chakra UI
chakra.description: Headless UI components for endless customization.

cicd.title: Streamlined CI/CD Workflows
cicd.description: Harnessing GitHub Actions to automate builds, tests, and deployments with precision and efficiency.

redux.title: State Management Simplified
redux.description: Empowering applications with Redux for predictable and scalable state management solutions.
